name: Woocommerce Multi Pay Master Plugin
author: Easycmspro

sections.description:
Best Woocommerce Multi Payment Plugin

Woocommerce Multi Pay Master is such a powerful Woocommerce Shop payment method plugin which help you to boost up your Shopping method upto next level. This plugin provides you to various methods to accept credit cards, contactless payments, and e-checks in person.

This plugin is the ideal solution for Woocommerce Multi Pay methods for your wordpress shopping website.

  • Woocommerce Multi Pay Master
  • Features
  • Demo
  • Upgrade to Pro Versions

Demo Admin Login
Username: admin
Password: admin123@

Tools available in Free Version

  • Authorize.net AIM
  • Braintree
  • Stripe

Take your woocommerce multi pay plugin to the next level with Premium Versions which gives you integration with 11 most popular tools.

Tools available in Premium Versions

  • Authorize.net AIM
  • Braintree
  • Stripe
  • 2Checkout
  • Account Funds
  • Deposits
  • Intuit Quickbooks
  • Paypal Diital Goods
  • Paypal Express
  • Paypal Pro
  • Purchase Order

Woocommerce Multi Pay Master is compatible with all browsers and devices (iPhone, iPad and Android smartphones).

Visit here to upgrade to Premium Versions now.

Technical Support

If you think, that you found a bug in our plugin or have any question contact us at support@easycmspro.com

Please use the support forum on WordPress.org only for this free version of the plugin.

For the Premium Version, there is a separate support package available.

Please do not use the WordPress.org support forum for questions about the Premium Versions.
sections.installation:
Woocommerce Multi Pay Master – Performing a new installation

Minimum Requirements

The following set of lists are the minimum requirements for installing Woocommerce Multi Pay Master on your machine.

  • WordPress 3.3+
  • PHP 5.x
  • MySQL 5.x

Using The WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the Plugins Dashboard
  2. Search for ‘Woocommerce Multi Pay Master’
  3. Click ‘Install Now’
  4. Activate the Plugin on the Plugin dashboard

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the Plugins Dashboard
  2. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  3. Select ultimo-woomultipay.zip from your computer
  4. Click ‘Install Now’
  5. Activate the Plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download ultimo-woomultipay.zip
  2. Extract the ultimo-woomultipay directory to your computer
  3. Upload the ultimo-woomultipay directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the Plugin in the Plugin’s dashboard

For Mac Users

  1. Go to your Downloads folder and locate the folder with the Plugin.
  2. Right-click on the folder and select Compress.
  3. Now you have a newly created .zip file which can be installed as described here.
sections.faq:
How to Install?

Here are the below-mentioned steps for installing Woocommerce Multi Pay Master on your WordPress.

If you are using the Free Version, you can follow the following steps:

  • Login to the WordPress Administrator Panel.
  • Go to “Plugins > Add New”.
  • In the Search box, type “Woocommerce Multi Pay Master” and press Enter.
  • In the results grid, you will get a link to “Woocommerce Multi Pay Master”, click on “Install Now” link for “Woocommerce Multi Pay Master”.
  • Click “Activate Plugin” link to activate the Plugin.

Hopefully, if you have followed the steps properly as mentioned above, you will see the success message.

If any problem occurs during the installation process, please contact us at support@easycmspro.com

How to Configure Tools?

Once you activate the plugin you will find Woocommerce Multi Pay Master menu under Woocommerce menu. You can enable and disable tools from here.

Once you enable these tools you will find a new tab added in your Woocommerce > Settings > Payments.

You have to put the required access tokens and configure these tools to work.
